script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background "sea_fireworks"
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@
マスターはピナーカを誘って
ファンキルランド内の
花火大会にやってきた

# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# voice 4002 "pinaka_0005"
@ピナーカ
ひゃぁ～！
こりゃ最高だなぁ！

# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@ピナーカ
でかい火花が
バッカンバッカンいって…
血が騒ぐぜぇ！

# select "まだ足りない？ " "select_label_01" "調子出た？" "select_label_02" "スッキリした？" "select_label_03"
でかい火花が
バッカンバッカンいって…
血が騒ぐぜぇ！

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
